blocks.title: A community
blocks.subtitle: Vivamus sagittis lacus vel augue laoreet rutrum faucibus dolor auctor. Nullam id dolor id nibh ultricies vehicula ut id elit. Cras justo odio, dapibus ac facilisis in, egestas eget quam.
paragraphs: OurGateshead.org supports community and voluntary groups across Gateshead and the wider areas, with a remit of increasing community-led initiatives. Over the growth of this site OurGateshead identified a need to increase public awareness and asked us to have identified a need to re-develop their website to improve the signposting of Gateshead residents to support, advice, services and activities.

title: Media of Things
acknowledgements: Tom Bartindale, Jasmine Cox, Ian Strafford, Dan Hett, Chris Northwood, Derek Brown.
